long_description: These Julbo MonteBianco glacier sunglasses provide total coverage and protection from harsh sunlight and extreme weather. Classic sunglasses are for mountain adventures and bright urban outings. Spectron 4 polycarbonate lenses block 100% of UV rays and 95% of visible light, reducing glare and creating a clear image. Flash treatment to lenses creates a mirror effect that helps filter visible light; anti-glare treatment to lenses eliminates glare reflections. Lightweight, tough nylon frames with flexible temples allow a natural fit to a variety of face shapes. Grippy inserts at ear stem ends become tacky as you perspire, holding eyewear in place during strenuous activity; does not stick to hair. Unique shields block light coming from the sides; can be removed as needed. Julbo MonteBianco sunglasses include a protective case for storage. Sized to fit medium to large faces.
short_description: These Julbo MonteBianco glacier sunglasses provide total coverage and protection from harsh sunlight and extreme weather. Classic sunglasses are for mountain adventures and bright urban outings.
